description:
No more pressure points and chafing in the ball area. With the Hallux Valgus model of the Tatra II you can go over all mountains in a relaxed manner! Whether it's a hut hike or day trekking - thanks to the plenty of space in the ball area, every tour is a pleasure. Further highlights: the supportive Vibram® profile sole, the comfortable insole, the sophisticated lacing and the soft shaft end. The leather lining ensures a pleasant foot climate.

*** All Hanwag boots are sold under UK sizing - Please see size chart for details/conversion
name: HanWag Tatra II Bunion - Mens
